title: Recent advances on anticancer and antimicrobial activities of directly-fluorinated five-membered heterocycles and their benzo-fused systems
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19752-19779
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01387E, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ashraf A. Abbas, Thoraya A. Farghaly, Kamal M. Dawood
The fluorinated heterocycles are main components of 20% of the anticancer and antibiotic drugs, this review describes the reported anticancer and antimicrobial activities of the fluorinated five-membered heterocycles and their benzo-fused systems.
